title: thillaana (jOnpuri)
sahitya:
dhIm dru dinna tAm tAm tajhaNu dhIm dhIm dru dinna tAm tajhaNu

nAdrudru dinna 

(dhIm)



anupallavi



tAm dhIm takata jhamjham tadari dhIm tari dinna tOm kukujham

tari tAm kiTa jham takatari

jham kiTataka takatari Nakatari takiTataka ditlAm kiTatari jham

tAm tAmkiTa takatari tajajham 

(dhIm)



caraNam



unnai anudinamum uLLattinil tudikkum kaNNan mIdun

karuNaikkkaNNOkki aruLvAi 

(dhIm)
